english.segment1: O come, All ye Faithful. O come, all ye faitful. Joyful and triumphant. Come all ye citizens of Bethlehem. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. Christ the Lord
english.segment2: Come and behold him. Born the King of Angels. Sing all ye citizens of Bethlehem. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. Christ the Lord
english.segment3: Sing choirs of angels. Sing in exultation. O sing all ye citizens of heaven above. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. Christ the Lord
english.segment4: Glory to God in the highest. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. Christ the Lord
english.segment5: Yea Lord we greet Thee. Born this happy morning. Jesus to Thee be all glory giving. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. Christ the Lord
english.segment6: Word of the Father. Now in flesh appearing. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. O come let us adore Him. Christ the Lord.
